title: 玩家进入出生点附近后，客户端就会崩溃
author: 熊镔
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2019-7-5 14:18 编辑 

玩家进入出生点附近后，客户端崩溃，再进入的话客户端就会停在加载地形，然后崩溃，服务器没崩
服务器没有错误报告
客户端错误报告如下
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  CustomSkinLoader (CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.10a.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
  CoreMod ([API]Aroma1997Core-1.12.2-2.0.0.2.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) (foamfix-0.10.3-1.12.2.jar)
  EnderCorePlugin (EnderCore-1.12.2-0.5.59-core.jar)
  ForgelinPlugin (Forgelin-1.8.2.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// You're mean.

Time: 7/5/19 11:35 AM
Description: Ticking block entity

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot get property PropertyEnum{name=variant, clazz=class vazkii.botania.api.state.enums.PoolVariant, values=[DEFAULT, CREATIVE, DILUTED, FABULOUS]} as it does not exist in BlockStateContainer{block=minecraft:air, properties=[]}

Always check the stack trace above to see which mod is most likely failing.):

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
打开服务器的文件夹 config/ 中的文件 forge.cfg ，将
B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false复制代码
改为
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码

replies.txt_content:
-- Block entity being ticked --
Details:
        Name: botania:pool // vazkii.botania.common.block.tile.mana.TilePool
        Block type: ID #0 (tile.air // net.minecraft.block.BlockAir // minecraft:air)
        Block data value: 0 / 0x0 / 0b0000
        Block location: World: (-897,64,1311), Chunk: (at 15,4,15 in -57,81; contains blocks -912,0,1296 to -897,255,1311), Region: (-2,2; contains chunks -64,64 to -33,95, blocks -1024,0,1024 to -513,255,1535)
        Actual block type: ID #0 (tile.air // net.minecraft.block.BlockAir // minecraft:air)
        Actual block data value: 0 / 0x0 / 0b0000
Stacktrace:
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:1835)

建议使用NBTExplorer移除world\region\r.-2.2.mca里面的[7,17]，建议备份原地图存档。如果这个位置有玩家建家建议适当补偿玩家损失。区块删掉后这个区块的建筑会缺失一块的。

另外可参考这篇教程：

[技术向]利用备份存档回档部分建筑/补偿玩家物品/回档错误区块教程
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-872765-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: xinyang0326
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xinyang0326 于 2019-7-5 18:28 编辑 

名为botania:pool[植物魔法的魔力池]的实体，卡区块了。可以使用NBTexplorer进行对r-2.2.mca文件内的chunk7，17进行操作[此方法为无损修复不会丢失建筑]
简单粗暴的解决办法可以直接删除r-2.2.mca文件
如果你不知道怎么删，可以联系我（已私发）！

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content: 问题都已解决，是小地图voxel map和植物魔法botania的魔力池产生的问题，删除小地图mod换一个就可以了。感谢各位的回答
